name: Enchanted Moonstone Rings
description: Rings set with glowing moonstones, reputed to enhance intuition, provide protection during travel, and reveal hidden truths under the light of the moon.

name: Dragon's Breath Elixirs
description: Potions bottled from the breath of dragons, rumored to provide immense strength and fiery protection.

name: Wizard's Spellbooks (Backpaper)
description: Ancient tomes filled with powerful spells and enchantments, perfect for aspiring wizards and witches.

name: Mermaid Tears Jewelry
description: Exquisite necklaces and bracelets made from the tears of mermaids, said to enhance beauty and grant the wearer a melodious voice.

name: Unicorn Horn Charms
description: Small, beautifully crafted charms fashioned to look like unicorn horns, believed to bring good luck and purify negative energy.

name: Fairy Dust Golden Velvet Pouches
description: Small pouches filled with shimmering fairy dust, claimed to have the ability to grant wishes and bring a touch of magic to everyday life.
